testcase.classname: Acceptance testing to validate Search cars page is working fine.
testcase.name: Validating Search cars page
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the home page "https://www.carsguide.com.au/" of CarsGuide website.passed When I move to the top menu.................................................passed And I click on "Search Cars" link...........................................passed And select carbrand as "Audi" from Anymake dropdown.........................passed And select carmodel as "A6" from SelectModel dropdown.......................passed And select location as "NSW - Sydney" from AnyLocation dropdown.............passed And select price as "$25,000" from price dropdown...........................passed And I click on Find_My_Next_Car button......................................passed Then I should see list of search cars "under $25,000".......................passed And the page title should be "Audi A6 Under 25000 for Sale Sydney NSW | carsguide".passed

testcase.classname: This functionality describe the signIn feature for CarGuide.au application
testcase.name: User able to sign in with valid email and valid password
testcase.system-out: Given not a existing user...................................................passed When user navigate to the application site "https://www.carsguide.com.au/"..passed Then home page should display with text "Sign up / Sign in" on right hand corner.passed And the page title should be "CarsGuide: Car Reviews - New & Used Car Sales".passed When user click on sign in link.............................................passed Then sign in page should display "Sign In with carsguide"...................passed When user click on sign in tab..............................................passed And user enter email address is "bsemran@hotmail.com".......................passed And user enter password is "Mse67890".......................................passed And user click on sign in button............................................passed Then home page should display "CarsGuide: Car Reviews - New & Used Car Sales".passed And user name "Mike" display at the top right corner........................passed
